div.head: 下利清穀
div.div: discharge with free flow of clear liquid and food

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: discharge with free flow of clear liquid and food

sense.def: Illness Sign of thin, watery excrements with the passage of undigested food. Shang han lun 傷寒論 317: 下 利清穀，裏寒外熱，手足厥逆，脈微欲絕 , “ Discharge with free flow of clear liquid and food . There is inner cold and outer heat. The hands and feet experience recession with counterflow. The [movement in the] vessels is subtle, and on the verge of complete interruption”.
